para.text: At the conclusion of the grant period, a grantee shall report the following information to DOES for each workshop held:
A summary of the workshop's content;
The data the community-based organization compiled at each workshop in accordance with ยง 32-171.04(d); and
The grantee's summary of the primary or most common workplace concerns in the District according to the concerns or questions raised at the workshops.
Post the information received pursuant to subsection (a) of this section on its website; and
Upon any individual's request for the information received pursuant to subsection (a) of this section, provide the information within 5 business days.
